lead_paragraph: As the local matchup tries to gain footing and luster it has barely been much of a rivalry at all, with the Red Bulls winning all four games.

headline.print_headline: Red Bulls Demolish New York City F.C. in a Rivalry That Remains One-Sided
headline.main: Red Bulls Demolish New York City in What Has Been a One-Sided Rivalry

snippet: As the local matchup tries to gain footing and luster it has barely been much of a rivalry at all, with the Red Bulls winning all four games.
abstract: New York Red Bulls rout New York City Football Club, 7-0.
